message.content:
cs.MA, cs.RO, cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems) is the most likely category as the paper deals with coordinating multiple vehicles to form platoons.
- cs.RO (Robotics) is also likely as the paper involves automation of vehicles.
- cs.IT (Information Theory) is relevant as the paper discusses the use of mobile communication infrastructure to coordinate platooning.
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) is relevant as the paper involves communication between vehicles and a centralized system.
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is relevant as the paper deals with controlling the speed and formation of platoons.
